com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory

Class InventoryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory.InventoryItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicInventoryItem, ServiceItem, ShopItem

    public abstract class InventoryItem
extends java.lang.Object
    An item used in an inventory menu. This is composed of an actual item stack, a display item type, and the cost and fame requirement of the item.

      abstract MenuAction getAction(QuestPlayer player)
      Return the action that should be performed when this menu item is clicked/activated
      abstract org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplay(QuestPlayer player)
      Returns a nice, pretty display item ocmplete with lore and naming magic
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getRawDisplayItem()
      Returns the display item without any modification to the lore, etc.
